name: Yume no Tsubasa
overview: As a sensitive young man of 17 years old, raised by only your father, your world falls apart when pops dies in an airplane crash. Your mother died when you were born. After your father dies, you decide to go live with your aunt and uncle in a ranch which was built by your grandfather. Focusing on the cause of your father's death, you pour your studies and work into understanding airplanes. The death of your father also makes you something of an introvert and shy around girls but your new locale opens up new possibilities with the opposite sex. Four girls in the game are your targets including Shuzuku Mizumo who lives with you on the ranch as a student boarder for the summer. She's a quiet girl with a serious streak and grounded sensibilities. Next up, Shinano Akiyama works at the local coffeehouse and you as a patron get to talk her up and discover her. At first, she's reticent to speak to strangers but as she gets to know you better, she opens up. Yuki Miyama is a childhood friend and you meet up with her again in your uncle's house. She's like a sister but there's also the chance of romance due to your childhood connection. Ouka Shiragiku's a close friend and she hints at possible romance with you. The gameplay is the usual in this kind of games sometimes there are more than one possible answers for the player to choose one of them and depending of the answers the story will be different, there are different game endings. The game features japanese voice acting for the characters.
